## Document language

<a href="/REDEME.md">中文简体</a> | English

## Introduce

YifanEpay is an easy-payment for individual Node developers who do not have WeChat Pay and Alipay payment, and this library supports the docking of mainstream easy-payment systems on the market.

## Characteristic

- 🎗️ Support mainstream easy payment docking on the market
- 🎗️ Lightweight and compact

## Installation

use `npm`

`npm install yifanepay`

Or use `yarn`

`yarn add yifanepay`

## Use

You can see the example in the 'test' directory

Simple example, get started quickly

```js
// Introducing the yifanepay package
const yifanepay = require("yifanepay");

// Create a random order number
let ordernumber = yifanepay.order_number()

// Create an array to put the required parameters (ePay will provide the following parameters)
let data = {
    pid: "xxx", // Easy to pay PID
    money: "0.1", // amount
    name: "Product name", // Product name
    notify_url: "http://xxx.com/notify_url.php", // Asynchronous notification address
    out_trade_no: ordernumber,// 订单号
    return_url: "http://xxx.com/return_url.php",// Jump notification address
    sitename: "Site name",
    type: "wxpay",// Payment methods: alipay:Alipay, wxpay:Wechatpay, qqpay:QQ wallet,tenpay:Tenpay
}

// Declare a parameter to call the method
let a = yifanepay.outcom("Easy payment key", "EasyPay platform address", data) // data is the array above

// Print A to get the link below
```

`http://xxx.com/submit.php?money=0.1&name=Product name&notify_url=http://xxx.com/notify_url.php&out_trade_no=202211150843370&pid=xxx&return_url=http://xxx/return_url.php&sitename=Site name&type=wxpay&sign=959a6e384855b97cbeeac85915a552ba&sign_type=MD5`
